dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
CEO (Chief Executive Officer:[REDACTED]i, ext 1200), Jul-12 05:01 pm (PDT):

I herewith confirm that this material is protected by copyright. 

 

Kind Regards,

 

[REDACTED]

 

MUSIC Group

Chief Executive Officer

Web: www.music-group.com | www.behringer.com | www.bugera-amps.com

 

 youtube.com/behringer  facebook.com/behringer  twitter.com/behringer  myspace.com/behringer  soundcloud.com/behringer  


:-) Build Teamwork :-) Take Ownership :-) Don't Waste Resources :-) Clean Workplace = Clean Mind :-) Respect Guidelines and Policies :-) Improve Yourself and Help Others :-) Don't Forget to Smile and Say Thank You 


This email is intended exclusively for the addressee(s) named above and may contain privileged and confidential information. If you are not (among) the intended recipient(s), you may not copy, utilize or distribute any of the information contained herein. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately via return email and delete the original from your mailbox. Thank you.

________________________________


----------------------------------------------
[redacted], Jul-12 02:49 pm (PDT):

no_username, Jul-12 04:47 am (PDT):

Tell us about yourself: I am the copyright owner.
Your full name: [redacted]
Job title: CEO

Email address: [redacted]
Street address: [redacted]
City: Makati
State/Province: Manila
Postal code: 0000
Country: Philippines
Phone number(optional): n/a
Fax number(optional): n/a

Description of original work: http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.448046268690.235839.737803690#!/photo.php?fbid=39215453690&set=a.448046268690.235839.737803690&type=1&theater

Reported Twitter account: fakeuli
Description of Infringement: The reported account is using my copyright protected logo or image.
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: Avatar (profile picture)
Type of infringing material: n/a
512(f) Acknowledgment: I understand that under 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512(f), I may be liable for any damages, including costs and attorneys' fees, if I knowingly materially misrepresent that reported material or activity is infringing.

Good Faith Belief: I have good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Authority to Act: n/a

Signature: [redacted]
